title: I just got 5 game ban
body: I just got a 5 game 20 min bam for something dell did. I was in the middle of the game and it instantly retarted and took like 5-10 mins to finally get back up. And in that time the game ended and i got the ban. And when my computer restarted there never was a warning or anything. Is there anyway i can fix or get rid of it?

replies.body:
You'll never get a 5x 20min low-priority queue for a single disconnection. In fact, it takes a trend of disconnections before you end up with this exact penalty. Unfortunately, we cannot remove or modify LPQs on an account. 

Going forward, I recommend taking care of windows updates as often as possible to prevent stuff like this from happening. Let me know if you have any questions.
